name: tasteway
description:
* Clone the Repository - T clone the repo ``` git clone https://github.com/yasermoamd/tasteway ``` - Create virtual environment ``` python -m venv .venv ``` - Install all requirements ``` pip install -r requirements.txt ``` - Export your flask app to your bash ``` export FLASK_APP=app.py ``` - Run the app ``` flask run --debug ```

Make sure it's --debug to enable hotreload
